name: hazel beanie
sizes_available: newborn, baby, toddler, child, tween, adult small, adult large
notes:
**hazel crochet beanie**
=======================================

the hazel beanie is beautifully cozy, worked from the bottom up with knit-look ribbing and an easy one-row repeat. 

the shaping at the top creates a smooth finish with minimal bulk, and you can add an optional pom pom for a fun touch. make it in a solid color or stripes - the choice is yours!

**sizes**
this pattern is written for 7 sizes, to fit the following head circumference:
newborn: 12"-14" / 30.5cm - 35.5cm
baby: 14"-16" / 35.5cm - 40.5cm
toddler: 16"-18" / 40.5cm - 45.5cm
child: 18"-20" / 45.5cm - 51cm
tween: 20"-22" / 51cm - 56cm
adult s: 22"-23" / 56cm - 58.5cm
adult l: 23"-24" / 58.5cm - 61cm


**video**
this pattern includes a full video tutorial.


**materials**
**yarn:** any #4/worsted weight yarn
newborn: 75 yds / 69m 
baby: 100 yds / 91m
toddler: 130 yds / 119m 
child: 155 yds / 142m
tween: 190 yds / 174m
adult small: 210 yds / 192m 
adult large: 250 yds / 229m 


**hook:** [5.5mm (i-9) crochet hook][3] (or hook required to meet gauge)
